title: DFG, German Research Foundation - News
snippet: The DFG and the NRF are providing a co-funding opportunity for Korean-German joint workshops and research visits. Proposals must be submitted by 16 April 2025. Professor Dr. Katja Becker and H.E.

title: DFG - German Research Foundation
snippet: The political breakthrough achieved in the negotiations strengthens Europe as a research hub and opens up new pathways towards climate-resilient and resource-efficient agriculture, says DFG President Katja Becker.

title: DFG, German Research Foundation - DFG to Leave the Platform X
